Module DanAdams.C482
Package Model

Class AlertMessages

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.AlertMessages
  • public class AlertMessages
extends java.lang.Object
    Alert class provides methods for prompting alert dialog boxes for data entry restrictions on the part and product fields

      • resetErrorFieldPart

        public static void resetErrorFieldPart​(javafx.scene.control.RadioButton inHouse,
                                       javafx.scene.control.RadioButton outsourced,

                                       javafx.scene.control.TextField min,
                                       javafx.scene.control.TextField machineID)
        Resets all the highlighted fields from the Part controllers. Rests all the fields set to highlight from the highLightErrorField methods in the Part controllers
        Parameters:
        inHouse - In House Radio button field from the Parts addParts and ModifyParts controller
        outsourced - Outsourced Radio button field from the Parts addParts and ModifyParts controller
        name - name field used from the Parts add and modify controller
        inv - inv field used from the Parts add and modify controller
        price - price field used from the Parts add and modify controller
        max - max field used from the Parts add and modify controller
        min - min field used from the Parts add and modify controller
        machineID - machineID and Company name field used from the Parts add and modify controllers
